scripts.db:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d
scripts.db:backup: docker exec nearmate-mysql sh -c 'mysqldump -uroot -proot --databases nearmateadmin' | gzip > backups/backup-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S).sql.gz
scripts.migrate:safe: npm run db:backup && npm -w apps/api run prisma:migrate:deploy
